conversation.text: I think my account information is out of date. Can you help me update it?
Sure, I can help you with that. What would you like to update?

metadata.reflection:
1. #V GetAccountInformation
2. #V UpdateAccountInformation password=<current_password> new_email=<new_email> new_phone_number=<new_phone_number> new_name=<new_name>
